void.description: Masters of dark energy, Void class users manipulate the essence of the void to drain life, create void fields, and unleash devastating annihilations. They can summon echoes of void energy to mimic their attacks and disrupt enemies with powerful void techniques.

drain.name: Drain
drain.description: Drains a small amount of life force from enemies, dealing damage over time and healing the user for a portion of the damage dealt.

oblivion.name: Oblivion
oblivion.description: Creates a void field that disorients enemies, dealing damage and reducing their accuracy and movement speed.

annihilation.name: Annihilation
annihilation.description: Summons a black hole or a powerful void energy attack that deals massive damage and pulls enemies towards the center, causing area damage.

void_echo.name: Void Echo
void_echo.description: Summons a void echo that mimics the user's attacks, dealing additional damage to enemies.

offensive.name: Void Blast
offensive.description: Fires a concentrated beam of void energy, dealing significant damage to a single target, causing Drain.

offensive.name: Void Pulse
offensive.description: Releases a pulse of void energy, damaging and disorienting enemies in a cone, causing Oblivion.

offensive.name: Void Grenade
offensive.description: Throws a grenade that creates a void explosion, causing Oblivion in the center and to any killed opponents.

offensive.name: Void Lash
offensive.description: Extends a tendril of void energy to whip and damage enemies in a line, causing Annihilation on its final hit.

defensive.name: Displacement
defensive.description: Temporarily phases the user out of reality, avoiding all damage.

defensive.name: Abyssal Guard
defensive.description: Summons void energy that reflects some incoming damage and reflects a portion back to the attacker, causing Drain.

passive.name: Ethereal Step
passive.description: Grants a small chance to dodge attacks by phasing momentarily.

passive.name: Void Resilience
passive.description: Increases resistance to all elemental damage.

passive.name: Echo of the Void
passive.description: Each time you deal damage, there's a chance to summon a void echo that attacks enemies, causing Annihilation.

support.name: Voidwalk
support.description: Allows the user to teleport short distances, evading attacks.

support.name: Temporal Distortion
support.description: Slows down enemies in a radius, reducing their attack and movement speed.

ultimates.name: Void Maelstrom
ultimates.description: Summons a swirling maelstrom of void energy that hovers over the battlefield, dealing continuous damage to enemies caught within its vortex. The maelstrom also periodically sends out waves of void energy that disrupt enemy abilities and reduce their defenses, causing Drain and Oblivion.
ultimates.synergy: Combines with Drain to amplify healing effects and increase damage over time. The defense reduction enhances the effectiveness of all void-based attacks, making Void Shield and Abyssal Guard more potent.

plasma.description: Wielders of high-energy plasma, Plasma class users can ionize enemies, causing them to explode with overload or create devastating supernovas. Their abilities focus on charging enemies with plasma energy, reflecting damage, and boosting the offensive capabilities of their allies.

ionize.name: Ionize
ionize.description: Charges enemies with plasma, dealing damage over time and making them more vulnerable to subsequent plasma attacks.

overload.name: Overload
overload.description: Causes plasma-charged enemies to explode upon death or after a set duration, dealing area damage to nearby enemies.

supernova.name: Supernova
supernova.description: Creates a massive plasma explosion that deals heavy area damage, often with a lingering effect that continues to damage enemies caught in the blast.

offensive.name: Plasma Bolt
offensive.description: Fires a bolt of plasma energy, dealing continuous damage over time, causing Ionize.

offensive.name: Plasma Burst
offensive.description: Releases a burst of plasma that damages enemies in a radius, causing Overload.

offensive.name: Plasma Grenade
offensive.description: Throws a grenade that releases a plasma explosion, causing area damage and Overload.

offensive.name: Plasma Wave
offensive.description: Sends a wave of plasma energy forward, damaging and knocking back enemies, causing Supernova.

defensive.name: Plasma Shield
defensive.description: Reduces damage taken from attacks, causing Ionize.

defensive.name: Reactive Armor
defensive.description: Reflects a portion of plasma damage back to attackers, causing Overload.

defensive.name: Plasma Barrier
defensive.description: Creates a barrier that absorbs damage and releases a plasma burst when broken, causing Supernova.

passive.name: Energy Absorption
passive.description: Converts a percentage of damage taken into energy for abilities, causing Ionize.

passive.name: Charged State
passive.description: Gradually builds up a plasma charge that enhances the next attack.

passive.name: Electro Feedback
passive.description: Each time you take damage, there's a chance to release a shockwave that damages nearby enemies, causing Overload.

support.name: Plasma Surge
support.description: Temporarily increases allies' plasma damage and grants a chance to ionize enemies on hit, causing Ionize.

support.name: Energy Transfer
support.description: Transfers a portion of your energy to allies, boosting their ability recharge rate, causing Supernova.

ultimates.name: Plasma Storm
ultimates.description: Summons a colossal storm of plasma energy that strikes the battlefield with continuous lightning bolts and plasma bursts, causing massive area damage and overloading enemies with plasma energy. The storm also boosts allies' attack speeds and energy regeneration rates. This ability uses the Ionize and Overload keywords.
ultimates.synergy: Amplifies the effects of Ionize and Overload, causing chain reactions and massive area damage. The boosted attack speed and energy regeneration synergize with Plasma Surge and Energy Transfer, enhancing both offensive and support capabilities.
ultimates.subtext: Supreme enemy clear and area denial, with strong offensive boosts and support for allies.

ultimates.name: Supernova Cascade
ultimates.description: Triggers a series of powerful plasma explosions that cascade across the battlefield, dealing immense damage to all enemies caught in the blasts. Each explosion charges allies' abilities, reducing cooldowns significantly. This ability uses the Supernova keyword.
ultimates.synergy: Works well with Supernova for massive area damage and Energy Absorption to rapidly recharge abilities. The cooldown reduction synergizes with Plasma Barrier to maintain defensive integrity.
ultimates.subtext: Combination of supreme enemy clear and rapid ability recharge for allies, making it highly effective in prolonged battles and boss fights.

crystal.description: Harnessing the power of crystalline structures, Crystal class users can shatter and pierce through enemies with sharp shards. They create radiant beams of energy and protective barriers, enhancing their resilience and reflecting attacks back at their foes.

shatter.name: Shatter
shatter.description: Causes crystal shards to explode, dealing area damage and possibly leaving behind dangerous crystal fragments that damage enemies over time.

pierce.name: Pierce
pierce.description: Launches sharp crystal shards that pierce through enemies, dealing damage and potentially causing bleeding or additional damage over time.

radiance.name: Radiance
radiance.description: Fires a concentrated beam of crystal energy that deals continuous damage to enemies in its path, potentially piercing through multiple targets.

offensive.name: Crystal Shard
offensive.description: Fires a sharp crystal shard that pierces through enemies, causing Pierce.

offensive.name: Crystal Nova
offensive.description: Creates a nova of crystal energy, damaging and slowing enemies in a radius, causing Shatter.

offensive.name: Crystal Grenade
offensive.description: Throws a grenade that shatters into shards, causing area damage and Shatter.

offensive.name: Crystal Spikes
offensive.description: Summons spikes from the ground, impaling and damaging enemies in a line, causing Radiance.

defensive.name: Crystal Armor
defensive.description: Reduces damage taken and reflects a portion of melee damage, causing Shatter.

defensive.name: Shard Shield
defensive.description: Creates a shield of crystal shards that absorbs damage, causing Pierce.

defensive.name: Crystalline Guard
defensive.description: Summons crystal barriers that block incoming attacks, causing Radiance.

passive.name: Prismatic Defense
passive.description: Increases resistance to elemental damage, causing Radiance.

passive.name: Shard Regeneration
passive.description: Gradually regenerates health when near crystal structures, causing Shatter.

passive.name: Reflective Crystal
passive.description: Each time you block or absorb damage, there's a chance to reflect the damage back to the attacker, causing Pierce.

support.name: Crystal Fortification
support.description: Temporarily increases allies' armor and damage resistance, causing Radiance.

support.name: Refractive Aura
support.description: Creates an aura that deflects a percentage of incoming projectiles for allies within range, causing Shatter.

ultimates.name: Crystalline Dominion
ultimates.description: Envelops the battlefield in a dome of radiant crystal energy, dealing continuous damage to enemies inside while simultaneously fortifying allies with crystal armor that reflects damage and increases resilience. The dome periodically erupts with crystal spikes, impaling and stunning enemies. This ability uses the Shatter and Radiance keywords.
ultimates.synergy: Enhances the effects of Shatter and Pierce, providing sustained damage and crowd control. The crystal armor boosts the effectiveness of Crystal Armor and Shard Shield, offering significant defensive and support benefits.
ultimates.subtext: Combination of supreme enemy clear, crowd control, and powerful defensive support for allies, making it ideal for both boss encounters and large groups of enemies.

ultimates.name: Prismatic Overcharge
ultimates.description: Channels an immense amount of crystal energy into a prismatic beam that sweeps across the battlefield, dealing continuous damage to enemies and healing allies caught in the beam. The beam also increases allies' critical hit chances. This ability uses the Radiance keyword.
ultimates.synergy: Works well with Radiance for sustained damage and Reflective Crystal for additional damage reflection. The critical hit chance increase synergizes with Crystal Fortification to maximize damage output.
ultimates.subtext: Combination of sustained enemy damage, healing support, and critical hit enhancement, making it effective for both boss damage and supporting allies.

shadow.description: Masters of darkness and fear, Shadow class users corrupt their enemies with dark energy, causing debuffs and continuous damage. They can engulf areas in darkness, summon clones to fight by their side, and instill fear in the hearts of their enemies, reducing their combat effectiveness.

corrupt.name: Corrupt
corrupt.description: Strikes enemies with dark energy, dealing damage over time and possibly inflicting debuffs such as reduced healing or increased damage taken.

fear.name: Fear
fear.description: Hits enemies with a powerful shadow strike that causes fear, making them flee or reducing their combat effectiveness.

darkness.name: Darkness
darkness.description: Engulfs the area in darkness, dealing continuous damage to all enemies within the radius and possibly causing blindness or reduced visibility.

clone.name: Clone
clone.description: Summons a shadow clone that mimics the user's attacks, dealing additional damage to enemies.

offensive.name: Shadow Bolt
offensive.description: Fires a bolt of dark energy, dealing damage over time, causing Corrupt.

offensive.name: Shadow Slash
offensive.description: Strikes with a blade of shadow, causing bleeding and fear in enemies, causing Fear.

offensive.name: Shadow Bomb
offensive.description: Throws a bomb that engulfs enemies in darkness, causing continuous damage and Darkness.

offensive.name: Shadow Wave
offensive.description: Sends a wave of shadow energy, damaging and pushing back enemies, causing Darkness.

defensive.name: Shadow Veil
defensive.description: Reduces damage taken from attacks, causing Corrupt.

defensive.name: Cloak of Darkness
defensive.description: Grants temporary invisibility, avoiding all damage, causing Darkness.

defensive.name: Dark Barrier
defensive.description: Creates a barrier that absorbs damage and releases a shadow burst when broken, causing Fear.

passive.name: Nightwalker
passive.description: Grants a small chance to dodge attacks and increases movement speed in darkness, causing Darkness.

passive.name: Umbral Resilience
passive.description: Increases resistance to dark energy attacks, causing Corrupt.

passive.name: Shadow Mimic
passive.description: Each time you deal damage, there's a chance to summon a shadow clone that mimics your attacks, causing Clone.

support.name: Dark Empowerment
support.description: Temporarily increases allies' shadow damage and grants a chance to cause fear in enemies on hit, causing Fear.

support.name: Veil of Shadows
support.description: Creates an area where allies become invisible and their movement speed is increased, causing Darkness.

ultimates.name: Shadow Cataclysm
ultimates.description: Engulfs the battlefield in impenetrable darkness, causing all enemies within to take continuous damage and suffer from fear, reducing their combat effectiveness. Allies within the darkness gain increased damage and speed. This ability uses the Corrupt and Fear keywords.
ultimates.synergy: Combines with Shadow Slash to maximize damage over time and Dark Empowerment for boosting allies' damage. The fear effect synergizes with Shadow Mimic to cause additional disruptions.
ultimates.subtext: Combination of supreme enemy clear, crowd control, and powerful offensive boosts for allies, making it highly effective in chaotic combat scenarios.

ultimates.name: Eclipse of Shadows
ultimates.description: Creates a massive eclipse that plunges the area into darkness, periodically sending out waves of shadow energy that deal damage and heal allies. The eclipse also makes allies invisible for its duration. This ability uses the Darkness keyword.
ultimates.synergy: Works well with Darkness for maximum damage and Veil of Shadows to enhance invisibility and movement speed. The healing effect synergizes with Nightwalker to provide continuous support.
ultimates.subtext: Combination of sustained enemy damage, healing support, and invisibility, making it highly effective for both offensive and defensive strategies.
